mapper.select: select procat.product_cart_id, , proinf.brand_id as brandId, brainf.brand_name as brandName, picinf.picture_inf_url as pictureInfUrl, proinf.product_name as productName, proinf.product_describe as productDescribe, proinf.product_price as productPrice from product_cart procat join product_inf proinf on procat.product_id = proinf.product_id join brand_inf brainf on proinf.brand_id = brainf.brand_id right join picture_inf picinf on picinf.product_id = procat.product_id where procat.customer_inf_id = #{customerInfId} and picinf.picture_type_id = 4
